thread.title: Dynamic Healthcare Systems to Sponsor and Exhibit at the AHIP National Conference on Medicare/Medicaid/Dual Eligibles
thread.title_full: Dynamic Healthcare Systems to Sponsor and Exhibit at the AHIP National Conference on Medicare/Medicaid/Dual Eligibles

author: Bob Cordisco
title: Dynamic Healthcare Systems to Sponsor and Exhibit at the AHIP National Conference on Medicare/Medicaid/Dual Eligibles
text:
Dynamic Healthcare Systems, a leading provider of enterprise-wide technology solutions for government-regulated health plans, today announced its sponsorship of the AHIP National Conference on Medicare/Medicaid/Dual Eligibles to be held in Washington, DC on October 18-22, 2015. Dynamic will also be an exhibitor at the conference. The Dynamic exhibit booth # 6 will offer opportunities for attendees to meet senior members of the company’s key executive team as well as interact with several subject matter experts, and learn more about proven solutions and services that help Medicare Advantage health plans more efficiently comply with changing CMS regulations while maintaining optimal efficiency and profitability. “Dynamic’s robust Voyager software provides Medicare Advantage health plans with an enterprise-wide solution that provides a strong risk adjustment strategy ensuring maximum and accurate payments, “ said Kathy Feeny, president and CEO of Dynamic Healthcare Systems. “Coupled with our team of subject matter experts, Dynamic solutions help Medicare Advantage plans overcome the compliance, risk adjustment and analytics required to predict and maximize revenues,” Feeny added.
Dynamic’s integrated software solutions are designed to ensure health plans meet the complex compliance and data processing requirements that the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) establishes, monitors and enforces. The Voyager suite of applications integrates various sources of data to create a single view of a Plan’s membership in order to deliver high-quality managed care and consistently meet compliance requirements and address revenue management challenges they face.
About Dynamic Healthcare Systems
Dynamic Healthcare Systems, Inc. delivers comprehensive enterprise software solutions and services for health plans with Medicare Advantage, Medicaid, and Marketplace lines of business striving to succeed amid new and evolving regulatory requirements. Headquartered in Irvine, California, the company brings world-class innovations to companies serving the government-regulated healthcare population. For more information, visit http://www.dynamichealthsys.com or call 949.333.4565.
